game.description: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the long-abandoned ruin, hidden deep within the Dragon's Spine mountain range.
game.quest_giver: Eilif Stonebeard, a grizzled dwarf miner
game.reward: A map leading to a secret underground chamber containing a trove of precious gems and metals

tasks.description: Journey to the Dragon's Spine mountain range
tasks.objective: Gather information about the ruin's location and any potential dangers that lie within

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous mountain pass
tasks.location: The narrow, winding path between the mountains' peaks
tasks.objective: Avoid deadly traps and fend off packs of ferocious goblins

tasks.location: The long-abandoned temple hidden within the mountains
tasks.objective: Locate and retrieve the Scroll of Eldrid, avoiding any powerful magical wards that protect it

game.title: The Lost Scroll of Eldrid
